infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Pairmeum needs access to your contacts to display contact information. Otherwise, you'll just see the number.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pairmeum needs access to your camera to read the invitation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Pairmeum needs access to your camera to read invitation.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Pairmeum needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Pairmeum needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Pairmeum needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
